ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
and(
not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), or(text( SBU__c ) = "D&S", text( SBU__c ) = "ATR"), Win_Only_Opportunity__c == true, or( IsClosed == true, text( StageName ) = "Closed Won", text( StageName ) = "Closed Lost", text( StageName ) = "Closed Cancelled" ), Active__c == true )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Win Only Opportunity must be inactived when closed.
